item.title: Empire of the Petrified Child
item.description: Culture Stonechild Imperial culture was heavily influenced by the mythology surrounding the Petrified Child (Stonechild Imperial: Äryýsh, from Proto-Morellic *Asteihar) Thus, religion was a big factor in the workings of society.

item.title: Morellic Culture
item.description: The Morellic culture existed at around 7,000YA. The culture began as the two tribes, Rhohita and Cervina, met. Language Proto-morellic was the language spoken by the early morellic culture.

item.title: Proto-Morellic
item.description: Proto-Morellic1 was spoken in 8,000 YA by the Morellic Minikin2, in the 2nd Realm’s Etavi Peninsula3. Phonology Consonants Consonants Labial Coronal Dorsal Laryngeal Plosive p b bʱ t d dʱ k g gʱ Fricative f v s z x ɣ h Sonorant m mʱ n nʱ l ŋ ŋʱ Vowels Vowels Front Central Back High i u Mid e o Low ä Proto-Morellic: Salanh Dalichu /sä.

item.title: Ram's Head Migration
item.description: Ram’s Head Migration is the name given to the Morellic cultural practice of placing babies in shelters built atop of the antlers of sheep.

item.title: Sarvara
item.description: The Sarvaran Civilisation existed around 7,000YA, and spoke Sarvaran. Notable People Hastini the Elephant Hastini the Elephant Sarvaran: Hestį́da /xesˈtĩ́.da/ was a Sarvaran general who was known to wear a copper elephant mask over his mouth.

item.title: Sarvaran
item.description: Sarvaran Sarvaran: /sɑˈʋɑ́.ɾa/ was spoken in 6,500YA1 in the Sarvaran Civilisation by Minikin. It descended from Proto-Morellic and so is part of the Morellic Language Family.
